document.full_text: hoping to bring tourists back to florida's panhandle beaches, governor rick scott joined bp officials and local tourism leaders on monday to announce a $30 million marketing grant for the region, which lost much of its business last year.
document.title: florida beaches get $30 million tourism boost from bp
lines_and_colors: hoping to bring tourists back to florida's panhandle beaches, governor rick scott joined bp officials and local tourism leaders on monday to announce a $30 million marketing grant for the region, which lost much of its business last year.
